page.title: 09TRAFFIC SURVEY ON M1 AND A5
page.content: This traffic count was taken mid_morning on Saturday 18 May for half an hour. It did not, therefore, include commuter traffic which would have expanded these numbers considerably. It should be noted however, that it was Cup Final day and this would exaggerate the numbers of south moving vehicles on the M1. On the A5, there was an evenly balanced flow with 212 vehicles going north and 208 going south. On the M1, there was a much heavier flow 940 vehicles moving south and 673 moving north. These surveys also show the weight of transport carried by the M1 and the problems this will cause during repair of if there is an accident. Local roads then become totally congested.
